# Overview
Animated vehicle colors!
This mod cycles car, tank, and spidertron colors through through dynamic themes.

----------
# Features
- 50+ color themes including classic rainbow, pride flags, and country flags
- Color theme and cycle speed can be changed in mod settings
- Affects all vehicles on every surface
- Compatible with multiplayer games and modded vehicles
- Includes main menu simulation integration
- Carefully optimized for minimal UPS impact

---------------
# Companion Mods
- [Rainbow Character](https://mods.factorio.com/mod/rainbow-character) - cycles player character colors through the rainbow
- [Rainbow Trains](https://mods.factorio.com/mod/rainbow-trains) - cycles train colors through the rainbow

---------------------

# Compatibility
There are currently no known mod compatibility issues. To report a compatibility issue, please make a post on the discussion page.
